import React from 'react'; import './index.css'; // Optional: If you have global styles const App = () => { return (
{/* Navigation Bar */}

Zero7 Motors

Features Cars Contact
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to Zero7 Motors

Your trusted car rental partner. Book your ride in seconds.

{/* Features */}

Why Choose Us

Wide Selection

Choose from sedans, SUVs, vans, and more to match your style.

Affordable Rates

Competitive pricing with no hidden charges.

24/7 Support

We're here to help you anytime, anywhere.

{/* Booking Placeholder */}

Available Cars

(This section will load cars from your API)

{/* Example placeholder */}

Loading cars...

{/* Footer */}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} Zero7 Motors. All rights reserved.

); }; export default App;
